title: I fear that if Morde turns out to be "ok" with a nerfed Rylais Riot won't give him ANY compensation
body:
I feel it'll turn out like this;
Mordekaiser mains are still going to keep playing their champ, trying to make him work and Riot will just go.
"Oh, he's doing 'alright' so we'll just leave him there." Even if he requires so much more work to actually pull off.

His sample size is so low, only die hard mains playing him so he'll still do somewhat decent.
The fact remains that he'll get hit, and after playing with it on the PBE it looks like it'll be a nasty nerf but Riot has a bad track record of giving Mordekaiser love when he so desperately deserves it.

Now, he really NEEDS a VGU but you can't just clap your hands and conjure one out of thin air. Until he gets that VGU he so desperately needs he could really be kept in a decent spot so that Mordekaiser players can have some fun with him while we await his time.

It's just that I'd wouldn't be surprised if Riot will just go "Eh, we don't even care about Morde being viable, he's doing alright, let's just leave him in that rough spot" instead of just making him overall more pleasant to play as and against.

Like, I'm sorry to spam the boards about this but I just really feel Morde will once again be just left in the dust :/

http://orig00.deviantart.net/8502/f/2014/015/0/a/mordekaiser_is_no_longer__1_by_eltonel-d729tog.jpg
